`<type>(<scope>): <subject>`

## type()

|    |                                     |
| :------- | :-------------------------------------- |
| feat     |                                 |
| fix      | BUG                                 |
| docs     |                                 |
| style    |                 |
| refactor | (BUG) |
| perf     |                           |
| test     |               |
| build    | (Makefile)        |
| ci       |               |
| chore    |                 |
| revert   |                           |

## scope()

commit

## subject()

commit
